headlines.title: Water found on Mars
headlines.story: Water has been found on Mars.  Percival Lowell is turning over in his grave right now.  Soon...aliens!

headlines.title: An Interview with a Track Star
headlines.story: Interviewer:'Why are you so great?' Joyner-Kersee:'The power is in my nails.'

headlines.title: Why Brooklyn-Nine-Nine has the best female character
headlines.story: They are funny.  Just watch it, damnit!

headlines.title: Veggies: They are awesome, eat MOAR
headlines.story: More veggies, less meat.  Better individual health, better population health, better environmental health.  It's that simple.
